sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROMNEY a town of Kent in England. It is one of the cinque-port towns, and is ſeated on a marſh of the ſame name, famous for feeding cattle ; but the air is very unhealthy. It was once a large and populous place, but the retiring of the ſea has reduced it very much.; however, it fends two members to parliament.
